casebody.data:

v.
Shawn McNEILL and/or Garnie McNeill d/b/a Ferrell's Construction and/or Ferrells' Construction, Employer, Noninsured, and Shawn McNeill and/or Garnie McNeill, Individually, Defendants. No. COA15-1041. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. May 3, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed.
